name: Blasting Bells
description:
* "Blasting Bell" is christmas game . In this game santa is standing with a ball in bottom & try to blast the top Bells using that ball.

* Throw that ball upwards from santa's hand by tapping on the screen.

* To destroy the bell through the same color ball.

* To swap current and next color ball you can using swap button.

* To blast more bells to get more points within a particular time.

* Easy to play this game.
